Package estimation.model

Class GameModel

java.lang.Object
estimation.model.GameModel
public class GameModel
extends java.lang.Object
Specification of the model of an Estimation game. The model contains the game's substantial data.

      Returns:
      a list with the game players' scores.

    • resetDeck

      public void resetDeck()
      Method to reset the game's deck. Restores the deck to the full 52 cards and then shuffles the cards.

    • reAllocateCards

      public void reAllocateCards()
      Method to serve cards to players in each round.

      Method to retrieve the game's round being played.

      an integer representing the game's round being played.

      Method to increase the game's round being played by 1.

      Method to retrieve a round's players.
      Returns:
      a list with the round's players.

      public void resetPlayerList()
      Method to reset the game's players at the end of each round.

    • getTrumpSuit

      public Suit getTrumpSuit()
      Method to retrieve a round's trump suit.
      Returns:
      the round's trump suit.

    • updateTrumpSuit

      public void updateTrumpSuit()
      Method to update a round's trump suit. In accordance with game rules, called after players' cards have been served.

    • getDealerIndex

      public int getDealerIndex()
      Method to retrieve the index of a player who is also a dealer.
      Returns:
      an integer representing the index of a player who is also a dealer.

    • updateDealerIndex

      public void updateDealerIndex()
      Method to update the index of a player who is also a dealer. Changes the dealer to the player to the original dealer's left.

    • getNumberOfTricks

      public int getNumberOfTricks()
      Method to retrieve a round's number of tricks.
      Returns:
      an integer representing the number of tricks in the round.

    • increaseNumberOfTricks

      public void increaseNumberOfTricks()
      Method to increase a round's number of tricks by 1.

    • decreaseNumberOfTricks

      public void decreaseNumberOfTricks()
      Method to decrease a round's number of tricks by 1.

    • getTrickTracker

      public int getTrickTracker()
      Method to retrieve the trick being played in a round.
      Returns:
      an integer representing the trick being played in a round.

    • resetTrickTracker

      public void resetTrickTracker()
      Method to reset the trick being played in a round to 1, in preperation for the next round. Called at the end of each round.

    • increaseTrickTracker

      public void increaseTrickTracker()
      Method to increase the trick being played in a round by 1, in preperation for the next trick. Called at the end of each trick.

    • getWinningPlayer

      public Player getWinningPlayer()
      Method to retrieve the winning player in the previous trick.
      Returns:
      the winning player's Player object.

      Method to set the winning player in a trick, in preperation for the next trick.

    • resetPlayedThusFar

      public void resetPlayedThusFar()
      Method to reset the list of cards already played in the trick, in preperation for the next trick.
